Reviews.Title: “Lovely apartment and great location”
Reviews.Author: middymad
Reviews.Content: We had a lovely two bedroom apartment with balconies at the front and back. It was beautifully furnished and very clean, and in the evenings the beds were turned down. The staff were very helpful and their recommendations on where to eat we're great. The location is very central - either for walking or using taxis. The metro is a bit further away and we did not use it but if you do, buy a ten trip ticket and use it for everyone in your group. There is a supermarket nearby too.

Reviews.Title: “I'd go back tomorrow!”
Reviews.Author: Rivoruss
Reviews.Content: This is a great place to stay. They've done a great job turning an appart-hotel into a boutique appart-hotel! Don't ya just hate having to get dressed just to have breakfast? Or in the evening, before going out, having to spend an arm and a leg for a good glass of wine? Then I'd really recommend staying here! Excellent location, wonderfully friendly and eager to serve reception team. SPATIOUS apartment with fully equipped kitchen, cable TV georgous elegantly appointed bathroom and very well decorated. There is simply nothing wrong that can be said about this place. We stayed in apartment 304. It had a balcony overlooking the street and was near everything!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Central and Beautiful”
Reviews.Author: RitsaZervou
Reviews.Content: We had an apartment on the 5th floor; two bedrooms, a spacious living area, a half open kitchen and a restroom with a shower. Everything was taken care of. There is a 24 hour reception; there is cleaning once a day and a follow-up in the evening. People are friendly and they speak English .... Great value...walking distance to all great locations and shopping areas, restaurants, cafes and bars!

Reviews.Title: “Great Value In January and Spot On Location”
Reviews.Author: 3xtabby
Reviews.Content: This was a 2nd trip to Barcelona so I was a little familiar with the city layout. I chose the Splendom suites based on their great tripadvisor rating and good location. We got the bus from the airport approx 9E return and got off in placa catalunya and attempted to walk to the apartments. I had already mapped this on google and should have only taken us 17 minutes or so. Oops we accidentally walked the wrong way down the Las Ramblas but once we sorted that out it was easy enough to find. There were very helpful staff and the apartment was lovely with a fantastic terrace. We tried to stay a 2nd night but were unsurprised to find that at approx. 60E per night in January it was all booked out. Oh well - I'm sure we will stay again in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and spacious enough but....”
Reviews.Author: 5Travellers1263
Reviews.Content: My family of five spent three nights at the Splendom Suites in Barcelona. It was great to finally find a place where we could all stay together instead of having to get two rooms in a hotel. The property was clean (except a little dusty in certain places only a tall person would notice), spacious and well equipped. There were plenty of little gorcery shops nearby to purchase breakfast and snack items. The downside was that the beds were extremely uncomfortable. I think we could feel every spring in the mattress. My 11 year old opted to sleep on the floor instead of the pull-out sofa. The walls were also paper thin so we could hear everyone around us, especially as they went up and down the stairs. We always try to teach our children to be quiet and respectful in hotels, but apparently not all parents do this. The location is o.k. as long as the weather is good. The nearest metro stops are a good 10 minute walk or more with kids (11, 10 and 8). We chose to ride the Aerobus from and to the airport. To take it back we had to walk all the way to Placa Catalunya dragging two suitcases. We could have taken taxis (need 2 for a family of 5) from the hotel as they were kind enough to offer to call for us, but we chose to walk instead. Not sure I would go back, but it was not a complete disappointment.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Accomm!!!”
Reviews.Author: AngeloM777
Reviews.Content: What a fantastic find. Great location,fantastic modern apartment with all the facilities - modern , clean, serviced and the best location to explore beautiful Barcelona. Staff were wonderful - I could not say enough about how good they were and how helpful.There eating recommendations were great!! We especially loved our meals at Cafe Lateral 5 min down the street - 3 courses,home style tasty meals, great service all for 10 Euros !!!?!! - unbelievable! We ate there 3 times in our 4 day stay as we didn't want to be disappointed elsewhere. Also great meal at the argentinian rest. down the road a little.Supermarket around the corner and easy walk to all attractions. Well done guys!! My family thank you and we would not hesitate to highly ++++ recommend you all.

Reviews.Title: “What an Impressive Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: WhitehorseVancouver
Reviews.Content: Our travel agent found the Splendom Suites for us, and we are sure glad that she did. There were four of us traveling (three adults and one child) and wanted a good base for exploring. The hotel is a fifteen minute walk from the Ramblas but has ready access to most of the best things in Barcelona The suite was spectacular -- extremely attractive, well-supplied, well-maintained and very comfortable. There were two complete bedrooms and a fold-down couch in the living area. Tons of extras: satellite television, good Internet service, a well-supplied kitchen. There were great restaurants nearby, a small grocery, an inexpensive parking garage and many other helpful features. Barcelona is a wonderful place to visit -- and this was a great base for our explorations.

Reviews.Title: “Wish we could have stayed longer”
Reviews.Author: cakwsk
Reviews.Content: This was an excellent find! There are 2 bedrooms with plenty storage. The "master" bedroom was very large with a desk, closets with iron, ironing board and a safe. The spacious living area and kitchen were comfortable and had all items needed for a longer stay including coffee maker and washing machine. Surprisingly, the bathroom was spacious with a large countertop and extra large shower. There was a hair dryer and magnifying make up mirror which was appreciated. There were 3 separate balconies in our apartment; one in each bedroom and in the living area with nice views to Valencia street which is noisy but the windows shut out the noise quite well. There were 2 flat screen TVs and free wifi. A great find!! Very clean with a friendly and helpful staff.

Reviews.Title: “Great find in Barcelona for a family”
Reviews.Author: tshock24
Reviews.Content: Clean, modern but still comfortable, 2 bedroom suite....Enjoyed the location as so many places in town stay where there is noise all night from those celebrating the nightlife. This is still an easy walk to all of the tourist options and a short cab ride to anywhere. Not full of amenities in the Lobby--but it had all that we needed and there was still 24 hour availability if something came up--albeit you actually walk outside to the door to the lobby (only 15 feet). There were good locks and CCTV for our building entrance and we felt very secure and enjoyed a nice place for a good price. It felt like a good find and value...

Reviews.Title: “Wow!”
Reviews.Author: Pauline B
Reviews.Content: This was only booked at really short notice through laterooms.com.Almost a home from home.Those small,but very thoughtful details.eg.fragranced diffusers,Molton Brown toiletries and slippers in the bathroom.Contemporary furniture and decorations.Well- kitted out kitchen.Spacious rooms,2 lovely roof terraces (Room 601).The list is endless!Another nice touch,was the information booklet,with helpful advice on supermarkets,transport services,local attractions and other ameneties.The reception area was relaxing and provided drinks and snacks.The two family members were lovely and nothing was too much trouble for them.I have already recommended them both at home and whilst in Barcelona.I would most definitely stay here again but on a romantic weekend next .Thank you for making our stay memorable.Unfortunately,our camera was stolen in Ciutedella Park but it did not spoil our visit to this beautiful city.

Reviews.Title: “Wow what a place style and value for money”
Reviews.Author: irishrafters
Reviews.Content: Well I have to say I'm a fairly fussy person when it comes to hotels and apartments and when I pay for something I do love a little luxury We have stayed in Barcelona before and the cost was phenomenal dor what u got but with the splendom suites all apartments are junior suites we paid less that wheat we would have elsewhere and we got a modern stylish 2 bed Apartment with a fab sitting room lovely kitchen balcony and lovely bathroom There is even a lovely complementary lavassa coffee lacking in the kitchen and the kitchen is very well equipped with everything you need it would suit all ages and families as there is a lift on the premises ( bit small for the closterphobic) and the apartments are big enough so u could bring young families if you were I would recommend that you ask for one of the apartments with a terrace All in all thus is a great place to stay in Barcelona there are some Nice places to eat close by and it is nt in the middle of the tourist area but still close to it If u could give it more than 5 stars I would would highly reccomend the splendom suites Oh yeah forgot to say they also have free wifi so bring ur laptop

Reviews.Title: “A bit out of the action, but very well equipped suite”
Reviews.Author: Charleswood1
Reviews.Content: Stayed in Late agust with our 2 children (6 and 8) very clean , very well equipped modern appartment - infact maybe too much - it's very nice to have everything that you have at home but we only would have needed to cook for 4. Having said this if you wanted to prepare a Dinner party for ten I can't think of anything that it didn't have to allow you to do so. perhaps they could forgo a few of the freebies and reduce the price a little - they were towards the expensive end even for Barcelona. only down sides - a bit off the beaten track for the numerous hop on bus routes , taxi back from harbour area and Ramblas about 14 euro. Our door was very close to a very steep stairwell and for youngh children , or someone a little worse for wear thay could have constituted a bit of a danger. An over active child upstairs running backwards and foward until midnight was clearly audible (sounded like a small heard of elephants) - soundproofing generally was good but not from floor to floor.Would stay again but given the choice of similar properties in Barcelona at considerabler lower prices I think they may need to drop their prices a little

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely fanastic apartments on the edge of the Eixample district”
Reviews.Author: KYLDN
Reviews.Content: Cannot rate these apartments highly enough. Everything was fantastic from the moment we arrived. Staff were incredibly helpful and attentive and the apartments were well located. Inside, the apartment was decorated and furnished to an incredibly high standard with fantastic facilities and lovely balcony views along Calle de Valencia. Would definitely recommend Splendom Suites to anyone visiting Barcelona and we plan to return for another stay next year.

Reviews.Title: “Nice size rooms, no frills, good location”
Reviews.Author: maderpint
Reviews.Content: Arrived at the hotel in the late evening, there was no receptionist, had to wait on the side walk for about 15 minutes before the receptionist came back from tending to other guests in their other property. The apartment was nicely appointed and had two large tv's, the one in the bedroom had no cable, it was only scrambled local tv signal. Besides that this is a very good value, there is no breakfast but the hotel offers some complimentary juices, coffees and teas and yogurts in the reception. There is no parking, but a nearby public parking garage is available. Staff was kind and polite.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place for families in Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: El_Guapo11
Reviews.Content: We spent 3 nights here in July with our 2 children (9 and 6). The apartment was spacious, clean, and well-equipped. Staff were friendly and accommodating, and the location was very convenient. Only downside is having to park at a nearby lot. However, everything else more than made up for that. We would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Poorly equipped kitchen was a disappointment.”
Reviews.Author: YarraValley7
Reviews.Content: The apartment we were given has the potential to be excellent considering how new, neat and tidy it looked but a few things need to be fixed. Considering all the other glowing reviews, we must have been given the dud apartment. There were no suitable bowls in glass or plastic that I could use for cooking in the microwave. There was no electric toaster. The oven only had one tray/rack (which was the base of a griller tray less its insert) and it had to be used for everything (including toasting bread). The stove top only had 2 burners. They had a coffee making machine and plenty of supplies for it but all I wanted was an electric kettle. When I asked about one upon arrival the lady who showed us to our apartment simply shook her head and said there wasn’t one. I put the coffee machine in a cupboard because it took up too much space on the small bench and used my own stove top jug for the first night. (This small jug is the only ‘cooking’ utensil I travel with – anything else I need I have to rely on the apartments we rent.) The next day, upon our return to the apartment, a new electric jug had magically appeared! It took me the full 3 days of our stay to work out how to get the washing machine to work each time I pressed the faulty start button. There was also something wrong with the locking device on the front windows but the shutters work well in keeping out the traffic noise. When we arrived there was a strong air freshener in the lounge area that we found overpowering so placed it in a cupboard. After returning from an all day tour, we noticed the apartment smelt very badly (like decaying garbage) and realised that was why the strong air freshener had been put in the room. We were not able to find out where the foul smell was coming from. The wardrobe in the second bedroom was unusable due to another overpowering unbearable smell. The beds are really firm but we were able to sleep on them. The rooms were clean despite the bad smell. The bathroom was a good size and had a good hair dryer. The TV was huge but the English satellite channels kept dropping out. This did not concern us too much as we didn’t expect to see English programmes on Spanish TV. The reception staff were all very helpful and courteous. We liked having the 24 hour reception which is not always available when you rent apartments instead of hotels. There is free internet access on a computer in the reception area. The small supermarket just around the corner had a good range of products. When I book apartments instead of hotels, it is because I need to use the cooking and washing facilities they provide. This apartment let me down so badly in these areas that I may as well have booked a hotel.

Reviews.Title: “One of the best accommodation in Europe for self catering apart.”
Reviews.Author: agilBucharest
Reviews.Content: Everything was excellent, starting with reception desk,cleaning and quietness ( our bedroom has a large terasse to the inner yard). We had a good sleep in a very good foreign bed. We recommand this location.

Reviews.Title: “Don't Stay Here!!”
Reviews.Author: RicciGlasgow
Reviews.Content: This apartment was not as advertised and very grubby. The owners claimed it was due to be decorated, but that is easy to say after I complained. There was no mention of it before and I requested a partial refund which they did not provide. I was there for my wedding anniversary and we could not wait to get out of the place. I have taken pictures to show what it was really like. If they say it has been redecorated, DON'T TRUST THEM. My pictures show the entrance, filthy stair carpet, graffiti on wall, signs with sticky tape, the door can hardly open into the bedroom, the bedroom view and worst of all the bathroom (disgusting).

Reviews.Title: “Just one let down, otherwise very good.”
Reviews.Author: jazzy1968
Reviews.Content: Location was excellent, quiet but within 10 minutes walk of the metro and 15 mins from La Ramblas. The room was very good, 5 of us (2 adults, 3 kids) stayed in a suite on the first floor. The staff in reception were very professional, courteous and helpful. The only negative was that the satellite / cable channels did not work in the room. I would recommend this and come again, if the satellite TV was sorted out.

Reviews.Title: “Great apartments”
Reviews.Author: meeree
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 4 nights in february and the apartments had a high standard. Very spacious (we had 2 bedrooms!) and a small balcony. Bathroom was bigger than what we have at home, and very clean. The cleaning was very good, they do the dishes for you everyday also, and the service at the reception desk was good. We got refilled chocolate and coffee every day. The location is a little bit off the main centre, but the great thing about Barcelona is that you can walk alot! So we had no problems getting around, by foot or by metro. You can take the metro from both Universitat or Hospital Clinic. Some people have said that beds are very hard; yes they are on the hard side, but we really liked them, and we had a flatscreen tv in the main bedroom, and we could not hear any traffic because the bedroom was facing the backyard. Only thing that was a little on the downside, was that I found the apartment a little cold in late february. We tried to turn the heat up, but didnt seem to change the temperature. But there was extra blankets, so not a big problem.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful apartment”
Reviews.Author: Anna-KarinG
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 2 nights; it´s a wonderful apartment but maybe a little bit off if Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas is the center of your visit in Barcelona. Very clean, great staff, quiet, bright. Perfect choise for two couples!

Reviews.Title: “Very modern, very clean and good location to explore Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: markdgoddard
Reviews.Content: Not the cheapest place to stay, but very practical and functional for a family with 3 younger children. The location allows you to get to most of the major attraction easily and the tube is only 5 mins away. The apartments were clean, well furnished and the maid service very good - allowing us to just concentrate on Barcelona which was fantastic. Reception staff were very helpful

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel with hard as rocks beds”
Reviews.Author: NCTraveler49
Reviews.Content: We choose this hotel because we were spending some time in Barcelona with our daughter, son-in-law and son before a cruise. The location was good...about a km from Placa Catalunya, Las Ramblas and Gaudi's Casa Batllo and Casa Milo. There were many great restaurants in the area. (We highly recommend Casa Julia for paella!) The suite was great...two bedrooms, sofa bed, one bathroom and a well stocked kitchen. Our biggest issue was with the HARD beds. I have slept on floors that were more comfortable! We ended up putting the down comforter under the sheets as a mattress pad and that helped somewhat. Everything else about this hotel was great but when you cannot get a good nights sleep it colors your opinion.

Reviews.Title: “Very helpful!”
Reviews.Author: pwilson26
Reviews.Content: We stayed in a nice room (room 101). It had a great view and was very well accomodated. We even used their kitchen to cook a meal. What was the best was that I left my iphone there and left for a cruise. 13 days later, they had kept it for me the whole time. I was so relieved to get my phone back!

Reviews.Title: “amazing city”
Reviews.Author: pipsharpe
Reviews.Content: We have just returned from a 5 day break in Barcelona staying at the Splendom Suites on our Honeymoon. The apartment was amazing, we were lucky enough to have a huge outside terrace at outside the rear bedroom which allowed us to watch the locals every morning whilst havig breakfast in the sun. The facilities are 1st class - great to come back after a day wanderign and feel as if you are at home rather than in a pokey hotel room. The guys in reception spoken excellent english and were very helpful, even though we arrived late at night. I would definitely recommend and stay here again- one small thing request an apartment on the side of the reception. We were on the other side and there is a night club next door that pounds out music until 4am - if you dont mind that - its ok but take ear plugs.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful spot to stay in Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: ngok
Reviews.Content: We stayed 3 nights in splendom suites with our 6-year-old son. We arrived in the afternonn and we had a little surprise in reception: the reception door was closed, with a note "will be back in 5 mins." :-) Well, we thought, this is mediterenian. We called the reception after waiting 5 mins. Some 15 mins. later someone came to take us to our room. Then I realized that Splendom Suites actually is not a hotel, but more like rental flat. The room was really perfect. Very nicely decorated and clean. A bedroom, living room, kitchen (including the utensils), washing machine (actually we did not use), iron, another small room for our son, a large TV and a tiny balcony with a typical Barcelona street view. Just around the corner there is a small supermarket where you can buy things for breakfast and easy to cook things. When you have a 6-year-old who doeas not like to taste new things in new countries, kitchen is great to prepare sandviches for the day and have a tea and snacks in you confortable room. The hotel is within easy walking distance to La Rambla street and it is just in the meiddle of Barcelona, where it makes it easier to come back to our room by taxi easily. The staff was helpful, if you find them:-) They were polite and gave good advices. I absoulately recommend this hotel. Nese

Reviews.Title: “Plenty of space for 2 couples per apartment - would recommend”
Reviews.Author: HillsonHols
Reviews.Content: Stayed here at the end of a cruise for 1 night with another couple - excellent condition - very clean and contemporary in design. Plenty of space - lovely bathroom with bidet! Don't agree with some previous reviews - we slept in the smaller bedroom and had no problems with comfort of the bed. Great small balcony overlooking the street but not for those who dislike heights... Excellent location - peaceful lovely area - very close to great shops, sights, restaurants etc. Staff at front desk brilliant providing map and directions and booking taxis to airport.

Reviews.Title: “Magical time in Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: eastcoastbb
Reviews.Content: Splendom Suites was everything it said on its website and then some. The apartment was immaculate, the staff was wonderful. Front office was very helpful with any requests. We had fresh sheets and towels every day. Furniture was sleek and modern, kitchen was pretty well equipped, great for making our own tapas each day. There was a great washer that came in very handy (for when I spilled stuff all over me...). The location (Eixample) was perfect, just a few blocks in any direction and you had everything you needed, cafes, restaurants, markets, attractions. Can't say enough good things about how perfect our trip was.

HotelInfo.Name: Splendom Suites
HotelInfo.Address: c/ Valencia, 194, 08011 Barcelona, Spain
